metadata.title: CVE-2018-12035 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In YARA 3.7.1 and prior, parsing a specially crafted compiled rule file cancause an out of bounds write vulnerability in yr_execute_code inlibyara/exec.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara3 - 3.7.1-3
yara - 3.7.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yara package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-3').
